name: Sunday School
description: Classes for K-Adult in the sanctuary. Growing in God's Word together.

name: Sunday Worship Service
description: Corporate worship with expository preaching from God's Word.

name: Men's Theology
description: An evening of fellowship and discussion. Meetings take place alternate Tuesdays at the church.

name: Ladies Bible Study
description: All women are welcome for evenings of fellowship and study. Meeting alternate Tuesdays at the church.

name: Youth
description: Grades 7-12 are invited for an evening of games, snacks, and Bible study. Meetings take place alternate Thursdays.
